shortDescription: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Chinagames CGAgent ActiveX control 1.x in CGAgent.dll, as distributed in Chinagames iGame 2009, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long argument to the CreateChinagames method, as exploited in the wild in April and May 2009.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.
vulnerabilityName: chinagames igame Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
